metro_train.title: All trains will run direct to/from Flinders Street via Southern Cross, not via the City Loop to last service tonight, while maintenance works take place. Passengers are are advised to change trains at Southern Cross Station.
metro_train.description: All trains will run direct to/from Flinders Street via Southern Cross, not via the City Loop to last service tonight, while maintenance works take place. Passengers are are advised to change trains at Southern Cross Station.

metro_train.title: Pakenham line: Buses replace trains from Saturday 12 September to 13 Sunday September
metro_train.description: Buses replace trains between Dandenong and Pakenham stations from 3.30am Saturday 12 September to last train Sunday 13 September. due to works.

metro_train.title: Sunshine Station: Temporary car park closures from 3pm on Thursday 10 September to 2am on Monday 14 September 2020
metro_train.description: Sunshine Station will be affected by temporary car space closures from 3pm on Thursday 10 September to 2am on Monday 14 September 2020, due to works.

metro_train.title: Sunbury Line: Buses replace trains from 5am Saturday 12 September to last train Sunday 13 September 2020
metro_train.description: Buses replace trains between North Melbourne and Sunbury stations from 5am Saturday 12 September to last train Sunday 13 September 2020, while Sunbury Line Upgrade works take place.

metro_train.title: Pakenham Line: Buses replace evening trains in September 2020
metro_train.description: Buses replace evening trains between Dandenong and Pakenham on select dates in September 2020, due to project works.

metro_train.title: Lilydale Station: Temporary car space closures from Monday 24 August to Monday 28 September 2020
metro_train.description: Sections of the eastern car park at Lilydale Station will be closed intermittently from Monday 24 August to Monday 28 September, while project works take place.

metro_train.title: Ringwood Station: Temporary car park closures from Saturday 29 August to Monday 21 September 2020
metro_train.description: Ringwood Station will be affected by temporary car space closures from 3pm Saturday 29 August to 8am Monday 21 September, due to project works.

metro_train.title: Oakleigh Station: Temporary car park closures from 6am Wednesday 2 September to 6pm Monday 2 November 2020
metro_train.description: Oakleigh Station will be affected by temporary car space closures from 6am Wednesday 2 September to 6pm Monday 2 November 2020, due to project works.

metro_train.title: Dandenong Station: Temporary car park closures from Tuesday 8 September to Monday 14 September 2020
metro_train.description: Dandenong Station will be affected by temporary car space closures from 4am Tuesday 8 September to 4am Monday 14 September, while project works take place.

metro_train.title: Cranbourne Line: Buses replace trains from Tuesday 8 September to Sunday 13 September 2020
metro_train.description: Buses replace trains between Dandenong and Cranbourne stations from 8.30pm Tuesday 8 September to last train Sunday 13 September, while project works take place.

metro_train.title: Werribee Line: Buses replace trains at select times from Monday 24 August to Thursday 17 September 2020
metro_train.description: Buses replace trains at select times on the Werribee line from Monday 24 August to Thursday 17 September, while project and maintenance works take place.

metro_train.title: Westall Station: Temporary lift access changes from Tuesday 18 August to Monday 14 September 2020
metro_train.description: Westall Station will have no lift access available between the overpass and platforms 2 and 3 from Tuesday 18 August to Monday 14 September, while upgrade works take place.

metro_train.title: Routes 411 and 412: Temporary bus stop closures from 9pm on Friday 4 September to 5am on Monday 5 October 2020
metro_train.description: Bus Routes 411 and 412 will not service selected bus stops from 9pm on Friday 4 September to 5am on Monday 5 October, due to works.

routes.route_name: Laverton Station - Footscray via Altona Meadows & Altona & Millers Rd
Laverton Station - Footscray via Altona Meadows & Altona & Mills St

metro_train.title: Mernda Line: Buses replace evening trains in September 2020
metro_train.description: Buses replace evening trains between Epping and Mernda on selected nights from Monday 31 August to late September, while project works take place.

metro_train.title: Merinda Park Station: Temporary car park closures from Tuesday 11 August to Wednesday 25 November 2020
metro_train.description: Merinda Park Station will be affected by temporary car space closures from Tuesday 11 August to Wednesday 25 November, due to works.

metro_train.title: Lynbrook Station: Temporary car park closures from Tuesday 18 August to Saturday 31 October 2020
metro_train.description: Lynbrook Station will be affected by temporary car space closures from Tuesday 18 August to Saturday 31 October, due to works.

metro_train.title: Berwick Station: Temporary car park closures and pedestrian access changes from Monday 20 July to early 2022
metro_train.description: Berwick Station will be affected by temporary car park closures and pedestrian access changes Monday 20 July to early 2022, while Clyde Road level crossing removal project works take place.

metro_train.title: Upfield Line Stations: Temporary car park closures from Monday 27 July to Monday 16 November 2020
metro_train.description: Stations on the Upfield Line will be affected by temporary car park closures at select times from Monday 27 July to Monday 16 November for Level Crossing Removal Project works.

metro_train.title: Essendon Station: Temporary car space closures from  5am Monday 9 November to 12am Monday 16 November 2020
metro_train.description: Essendon Station will be affected by temporary car space closures from  5am Monday 9 November to 12am Monday 16 November due to works.

metro_train.title: Pascoe Vale Station: Temporary car space closures from 5am Monday 27 July to 12am Monday 16 November 2020
metro_train.description: Pascoe Vale Station will be affected by temporary car space closures from 5am Monday 27 July to 12am Monday 16 November, due to works.

metro_train.title: Routes 19 and 58: Increased service demand from 8.30pm on Monday 27 July to Sunday 15 November 2020
metro_train.description: Route 19 and 58 trams may experience higher than usual demand from 8.30pm on Monday 27 July to last tram on Sunday 15 November 2020, due to level crossing removal works on the Upfield line.

routes.route_name: North Coburg - Flinders Street Station & City

metro_train.title: Greensborough Station: Temporary car space closures from Friday 24 July to late October 2020
metro_train.description: Greensborough Station will be affected by temporary car space closures from Friday 24 July to late October, due to project works.

metro_train.title: Glenroy Station: Temporary car park closure from Monday 31 August to early 2021
metro_train.description: Glenroy Station will be affected by temporary car space closures from Monday 31 August to early 2021, while project works take place.

metro_train.title: Sandown Park Station: Temporary car park closures from Monday 15 June to Wednesday 30 September 2020
metro_train.description: Sandown Park Station will be affected by temporary car space closures from 4am Monday 15 June to 6pm Wednesday 30 September, due to project works.

metro_train.title: Upfield Line: Buses replace trains from Monday 27 July to Sunday 15 November 2020
metro_train.description: Buses replace trains on sections of the Upfield line from Monday 27 July to Sunday 15 November, due to level crossing removal works. Buses replace trains Flagstaff to Upfield from 8.30pm Monday 27 July to Sunday 2 August, then Anstey to Upfield from Monday 3 August.

metro_train.title: Mooroolbark Station: Temporary car space closures from Friday 21 August 2020 to early 2022
metro_train.description: Mooroolbark Station will be affected by select temporary car space closures from Friday 21 August 2020 to early 2022, while project works take place.

metro_train.title: Sandringham Line stations: Temporary car park closures and pedestrian access changes from Friday 20 March to Monday 6 April 2020
metro_train.description: Stations on the Sandringham Line will be affected by temporary car park closures and changes to pedestrian access from Friday 20 March to Monday 6 April, due to major renewal works.

metro_train.title: Coburg Station: Station changes from Monday 3 February 2020 to mid-2021
metro_train.description: Coburg Station will be affected by station changes including a station closure, temporary car space closures and pedestrian access changes from Monday 3 February to mid-2021, while level crossing removal works take place.

metro_train.title: Cardinia Road Station: Temporary pedestrian access changes from Sunday 24 November 2019 to 2021
metro_train.description: Cardinia Road Station will be affected by temporary car space closures and pedestrian access changes from Sunday 24 November 2019 to 2021, while level crossing removal works take place.

metro_train.title: Moreland Station: Station changes from Thursday 7 November 2019 to mid-2021
metro_train.description: Moreland Station will be affected by station changes including a station closure, temporary car space closures and pedestrian access changes from 7am Thursday 7 November 2019 to mid-2021, while level crossing removal works take place.

metro_train.title: Flinders Street Station: Temporary changes to pedestrian access from Monday 2 September 2019 until further notice
metro_train.description: There will be changes to pedestrian access to Flinders Street station from Monday, 2 September 2019 until further notice, while Metro Tunnel Project works take place.

metro_train.title: West Footscray Station: Temporary car park closures from 7pm Friday 1 March 2019 to early 2021
metro_train.description: West Footscray Station will be affected by temporary car space closures from 7pm Friday 1 March 2019 to Monday 30 November, while Metro Tunnel Project works take place.

metro_train.title: Frankston Line stations: Temporary car park closures and changes to pedestrian access until mid-2022
metro_train.description: Stations on the Frankston Line will be affected by temporary car park closures and changes to pedestrian access at select times in late 2018 and mid 2022, due to works as part of the Level Crossing Removal Project as well as other maintenance works.
